t:
I realized I was being stalked when I found a note in my mailbox,
        ‘Have you noticed me yet?’

It soon escalated from there in the next few weeks.



As I hide in my closet now, I'm confused, as I cut into my arm,
        ‘Have you noticed me yet?’
c:
I've no control over my other hand.



#stalking #note #notice #closet #mailbox #dissociativeidentitydisorder #possession #confused





You can interpret this as a demonic possession or DID (Dissociative Identity Disorder).
